projects.name: MediaHub
projects.description: Designed and developed a video player backend using Implemented RESTful APIs for video management, enabling CRUD operations and file uploading. Integrated authentication and authorization functionalities for secure access to video content. Utilized Mongoose for database modeling and optimized performance for scalability.

projects.name: ConvoConnect
projects.description: Engineered a user-friendly ChatApp utilizing WebSockets and the to ensure seamless communication. Led end-to-end project execution, integrating Socket.io for real-time client communication. Orchestrated the deployment of a scalable architecture, optimizing performance and scalability.

experiences.description: Organized and led a successful bootcamp for 50+ students in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing comprehensive training and mentorship. Conducted live portfolio demonstrations using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering practical insights to students. Fostered an engaging environment for skill development and creativity within the Mycin Innovation Club through hands-on projects and collaborative learning.
